mapper.select: SELECT mbnum, title, writer, wdate, filepath FROM ( SELECT SEQ, mbnum, title, writer, wdate, filepath FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ, mbnum, title, writer, wdate, filepath FROM ( SELECT * FROM miniboard where mbname=#{vo.mbname} and writer=#{vo.writer} ORDER BY mbnum desc ) ) WHERE SEQ >= (#{page}-1)*10+1 ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
mapper.update: update miniboard set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, filepath=#{filepath}, wdate=sysdate where mbnum=#{mbnum}
